dct_title_s: Salem and Gloucester counties, New Jersey wall map
dct_description_sm: A map of the counties of Salem and Gloucester, New Jersey, from original surveys conducted by Alexander C. Stansbie, James Keily and Samuel M. Rea. Color coded by township. Includes two drawn illustrations, written descriptions of each county, statistical table of land acreage, and tax rates.
